start_message:
✨🔮 **WELCOME TO FAL GRAM** 🔮✨
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

🌟 *The doors of the mystical world are opening...*

☕ **Coffee Fortune** - Discover the future in your cup
🃏 **Tarot Reading** - The cards have something to tell you
💭 **Dream Analysis** - Decode your subconscious messages
⭐ **Astrology** - Guidance from the stars
🌅 **Daily Card** - Personal guidance every morning
👥 **Invite Friends** - Blessings multiply when shared

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
✨ *Are you ready to discover your destiny?* ✨
referral_prompt:
Earn free readings by sharing Fal Gram with your friends! Copy the link below and send it to them. You'll get 1 FREE reading for each friend who joins using your link.

Your special link: {referral_link}
referral_success: Awesome! A friend has joined using your referral link. You've earned 1 FREE reading as a gift!
coffee_fortune_prompt: Great choice! Just send a photo of your coffee cup for a reading.
tarot_fortune_prompt: Excellent! I am drawing a tarot card for you...
tarot_card_drawn: Here is your card: {card}. I am now interpreting it for you, please wait...
dream_analysis_prompt: Welcome to the mysterious world of dreams. Please write down your dream in detail and send it to me.
enter_birth_info: 📅 Enter your birth details (DD.MM.YYYY HH:MM - City):
compatibility_prompt: 💕 Select your sign to learn compatibility between two signs:
daily_card_subscribe: Great! I will now send you a special 'Tarot Card of the Day' and its interpretation every day.
daily_card_unsubscribe: Understood. Daily card delivery will no longer be active.
daily_card_already_subscribed: Your 'Card of the Day' subscription is already active. You will receive your card every morning.
language_selection: Which language would you like to continue in?
language_detected: 🌐 Your language automatically detected as {lang}. Use language button to change if needed.
fortune_request: Send a photo of your coffee cup...
fortune_limit_reached: Your free fortune limit is reached. {stars_count} Telegram Stars required to continue.
fortune_error: ❌ An error occurred while creating your fortune.
edit_schedule_prompt: Update daily card sending time (HH:MM format):
